1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu'awiyah bin Abu Sufyan that:He asked his sister Umm Habibah, the wife of the Prophet: "Did the Messenger of Allah ever offered prayer in a garment in which he had sexual intercourse?" She said: "Yes, if there was nothing noxious on it

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الَّذِي يُجَامِعُ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Offering prayer in a garment in which one has had intercourse
